This environment already exists, please: 該環境已存在，請重新輸入
Please configure proxy IP and port in th: 需要在插件設定中配置代理ip和端口號，否則無法連接伺服器
Recommended for single-person developmen: 建議單人開發使用，upload_on_save設定為true時，submit_git_before_upload無效，預設為false
Default is false; if upload_on_save is t: 預設為false，如果upload_on_save為true，則此選項無效
Recommended for team development to prev: 團隊開發建議開啟，防止覆蓋遠端代碼
Only SSH supports remote decompression;: 只有ssh支援遠端解壓，其他需要手動解壓
Delete remote directory before uploading: 上傳前是否刪除遠端目錄
Delete remote distPath configuration dir: 上傳前是否刪除遠端distPath配置目錄，一般用於清理前端部署代碼
Generally used for frontend deployment c: 一般用於前端部署代碼，distPath中只有一個路徑時才生效
Used for right-click upload and remote f: 用於本地右鍵上傳和比對遠端檔案
Please select configuration (checked is: 請選擇配置（勾選為true，未勾選為false）
Commit message cannot be empty, please r: 提交訊息不能為空，請重新填寫！
Please configure server protocol type [t: 請配置伺服器協議類型[type]，如ftp、sftp、ssh
Please configure server password or key: 請配置伺服器密碼或者密鑰檔案路徑
Please configure server file directory [: 請配置伺服器檔案目錄[remotePath]
Server: {0} Address: {1} Not uploade: 伺服器：{0}   地址：{1}   未上傳：{2}

Permission error, permission range shoul: 權限錯誤，權限範圍應為：000-777
Please set the default configuration fir: 請先設定預設配置：{default: true}
Default configuration {default: true} ca: 預設配置：{default: true} 不能超過1個
Are you sure you want to clear all watch: 您確定要清除所有watch快取嗎？
Are you sure to generate a new secret ke: 您確定要生成新的密鑰嗎？將會導致其他專案已加密的配置檔案失效！
Please check if the proxy configuration: 請檢查代理配置是否正確
